resources.string: Booooo, Republicans in this state voted for trump....
Republicans in this state voted for someone else...
Republicans have not voted in this state yet

I do not care about your user experience. This is how this search works: Enter text to search for states or quotes. To filter by Asshole density enter a number between 0 and 100. The search will look for states with a density greater than the number you entered. To search by state size in square miles, enter a number greater than 100. The search will look for states that are smaller than that number.
I won this state! I am crazy mother fucker too! Time to drop out!
Hey guys! I won a state too!
